195586.「僕は 古代オルセコ王家の子孫 エリガン。\n 先祖の足跡を追って この地を訪れ:
I am Eligan, a descendant of the ancient Orseco royal family. I came here in the footsteps of my ancestors. It is so desolate
now, but if you listen carefully, you can hear the voices of the Orseco fighters.

195587.木箱の中には ムニュ大臣の宮廷記録が\n何冊も 納められていた。<bw_brea:
Inside the crate were several volumes of
Minister Munyu's court records.<bw_break>

195588.<pc>は ゾンガロンの封印について\n記された書を 見つけた！:
<pc> found a book describing the
sealing of Zongalon!

195589.「ガズバランのしるしは 先祖グリエが\n 求めていたもの……。 \n しかし 手:
The Gazbalan Badge was sought by my ancestor Grie.But by the time I got it, it was too late. When I read the journal of my ancestor,
I couldn't stand the thought of it, so I came all the way to Orseco Kingdom, which had perished. I am glad to have met you.I think I
was able to accomplish something important.

195590.「俺は オルセコ王家の子孫 エリガンだ。\n 先祖ギルガランの 足跡をたどって\:
I am Eligan, descendant of the royal house of Orseco. I have come this far following in the footsteps of my ancestor Gilgaran. The Orseco
Kingdom reached its peak during the reign of my ancestor Gilgaran the Great. It was a vibrant place, filled with travelers from all
over the world. On his deathbed, he told his sons, ''There is still peace in Ogreed.There are many in Ogreed who still do not live in
peace. Leave Orseco and start a new nation. And grant Quaint Area to all Ogres everywhere. I say. And so, leaving my youngest brother,
who is of my lineage, the princes of Orseco scattered to the provinces. I don't know what happened to them, but I believe that the blood
of Orseco is still being passed on throughout the Ogre lands.

199368.ふところの エテーネルキューブから\nキュルルの声が 聞こえる。:
Kyururu's voice can be heard coming from the
Ethenel Cube.

199369.<pipipi_high>「すでに 起きてしまった歴史を 変えるのは \n 簡単:
It is not easy to change history that has already happened, Kyuru. I said so before, Kyuru. I was surprised that Grie died and
Gilgaran survived, but in the end Orseco Kingdom was destroyed and this man's ancestors were replaced. Such is the power of
revisionist history. Kyuru, the slight changes caused by the passage of time make no difference in the big picture. Still, you will
continue to struggle to change history, won't you? It is an irrational principle of action that I do not understand.
